dcterms:creator: F. Alva-Manchego
L. Martin
A. Bordes
C. Scarton
B. Sagot
L. Specia
dcterms:description: This dataset comprises 2,359 sentences from English Wikipedia, each paired with eight simplified references written by crowd-workers. It is created primarily focusing on lexical paraphrasing.
dcterms:title: Turk

dcterms:creator: F. Alva-Manchego
L. Martin
A. Bordes
C. Scarton
B. Sagot
L. Specia
dcterms:description: This dataset uses the same 2,359 source sentences as the Turk dataset. It differs from Turk by aiming at rewriting sentences with more diverse transformations, i.e., paraphrasing, deleting phrases, and splitting a sentence, and provides 10 simplified references written by crowd-workers.
dcterms:title: ASSET

dcterms:creator: W. Xu
C. Callison-Burch
C. Napoles
dcterms:description: This dataset originates from a collection of news articles accompanied by simplified versions written by professional editors. It was subsequently aligned from article-level to sentence-level, resulting in approximately 94k complex-simple sentence pairs.
dcterms:title: Newsela
